name: Cooper Park Skatepark
description: Neighborhood skatepark in Cooper Park. Small but well-maintained with a friendly local scene.
history: Added during Cooper Park renovations. Popular with the East Williamsburg and Bushwick skating community.
transitDirections: L to Grand St or Morgan Ave.

detailedNotes.terrain: Features include ledges, rails, quarter pipes, manual pads. Well-maintained concrete construction.
detailedNotes.culture: Part of the Brooklyn skate scene in East Williamsburg. Added during Cooper Park renovations. Popular with the East Williamsburg and Bushwick skating community.
detailedNotes.tips: Best approach: L to Grand St or Morgan Ave.. Afternoons and weekends.
detailedNotes.warnings: Public skatepark â€” standard park etiquette applies.
